Name: Average resolution time following 'Accepted + Wait - Customer'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Accepted + Wait - Customer and the end of the case

Name: Average time from 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' to 'Completed + In Call'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' and activity 'Completed + In Call'

Name: Total time spent in 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' across all cases
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Accepted + Wait - Customer and the end of the case

Name: Minimum time from 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' to 'Completed + Resolved'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' and activity 'Completed + Resolved'

Name: Average time difference between 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' and 'Accepted + In Progress' across cases
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' and activity 'Accepted + In Progress'

Name: Total resolution time of cases starting with 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' and ending with 'Completed + Closed'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' and activity 'Completed + Closed'

Name: Average time from 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' to the next activity in the process
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Accepted + Wait - Customer and the end of the case

Name: Total time from 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' to 'Completed + In Call' across all relevant cases
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' and activity 'Completed + In Call'

Name: Minimum time to complete an activity following 'Accepted + Wait - Customer'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity Accepted + Wait - Customer and the end of the case

Name: Average time from 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' to 'Completed + Closed' in cases where 'Completed + In Call' is also present
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' and activity 'Completed + Closed'

Name: Average duration of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' in comparison to 'Accepted + Wait - Vendor'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' and activity 'Accepted + Wait - Vendor'

Name: Total duration of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' in cases that involve 'Queued + Awaiting Assignment' before it
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' and the end of case where activity 'Queued + Awaiting Assignment occurs

Name: Minimum duration of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' in cases leading to 'Completed + Resolved'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' and activity 'Completed + Resolved'

Name: Average duration from 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' to 'Accepted + Assigned'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' and activity 'Accepted + Assigned'

Name: Total time from 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' to the first occurrence of 'Completed + In Call'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' and activity 'Completed + In Call'

Name: Minimum time from 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' to 'Accepted + In Progress' across all cases
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' and activity 'Accepted + In Progress'

Name: Average time it takes to resolve a case after 'Accepted + Wait - Customer'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' and the end of case where activity 'Completed + Resolved occurs

Name: Total time for all occurrences of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' to reach 'Completed + Closed'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' and activity 'Completed + Closed'

Name: Average time between 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' and 'Accepted + Wait - Implementation'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' and activity 'Accepted + Wait - Implementation'

Name: Total time spent in 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' before moving to any 'Completed' status activity
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' and activity 'Completed + Resolved'
